## Loading the data


```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## function, join, 5 verbs,  Issues tab, blog post text

##Rename
```{r}
committees_copy <- committees%>%
  rename(cand_pcc = cmte_id)
```


```{r}
house_win<-house_elections%>%
  filter(ge_winner=="W")%>%
  rename(cand_id = fec_id)%>%
  left_join(candidates, by = "cand_id")%>%
  left_join(committees_copy, by = "cand_pcc")%>%
  select(cand_id,candidate_name,party, general_votes, cand_election_yr,cand_office_state, cand_pcc, cmte_name)
  
```

##Contribution
```{r}
cont_sum <- contributions%>%
  group_by(name)%>%
  summarize(N = n(), transaction_amountsum = sum(transaction_amt))%>%
  filter(N>20)%>%
  
```
